p: Results: We recruited 100 pts. for each group. Epidemiological data were not different in PO-I vs PO-D (mean age 69 ± 11 vs 68 ± 12 y; BW 81 ± 19 vs 86 ± 22 kg; male 66 vs 71 %). Major cause of AKI was sepsis (41 %). Incidence of severe hypophoph: PO-I 66 vs PO-D 12 pts. (p < 0.05). Duration of mechan. vent.:PO-I 592 ± 508 vs PO-D 428 ± 466 h(n.s.), ICU days PO-I 33 ± 30 d vs PO-D 26 ± 25 d (n.s.).
